QuestData.Title: What Rots Beneath
QuestData.Description:
Good job killin' Ateena and sendin' whatever dat construct was down ta da bottom of... whatever dis ting be.
Me scouts be seein' Titan Keeper Hezrel marchin' down to sometin' called da Altar of Rot.
Now dat we got rid of dat construct, we can be flyin' down dere ta see what Hezrel be up to.
Dis be best handled by you and me. Da princess be havin' business back in da city.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Titan Keeper Hezrel within the Altar of Rot.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Titan Keeper Hezrel within the Altar of Rot.

Objectives.Objective: Fly down to the Altar of Rot
